member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.Properties.Resources.MissingFaultDescription
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The operation '{0}' has no FaultContract defined for validation. Add the [FaultContract(typeof(ValidationFault))] attribute to this operation. .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationBehavior
member.summary: The behavior class that set up the validation contract behavior for implementing the validation process.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationBehavior.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Internal use initializer that set the client validation flag.
member.param: if set to true [enabled].
if set to true [enable client validation].

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationBehavior.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. The property will be set as 'true'.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationBehavior.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. The property will be set to 'true'.
member.param: The name of the validation ruleset to apply.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationBehavior.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationBindingElement
member.summary: Represents the binding element that contains the message validation policy.

member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns a copy of the binding element object.
member.returns: A object that is a deep clone of the original.

member.summary: Gets the property.
member.param: The context.

member.summary: Represents a configuration element that specifies a message validation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationBindingElementExtension.CreateBindingElement
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, returns a custom binding element object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationBindingElementExtension.BindingElementType
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the object that represents the custom binding element.
member.returns: A object that represents the custom binding type.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationDetail
member.summary: This class holds the results of a single validation. Effectively, it's the same as a ValidationResult, but creating a separate class allows us to mark up a DataContract with impunity.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationDetail.#ctor
member.summary: Construct a new object with empty fields.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationDetail.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Construct a new object with the given values.
member.param: Message about validation failure.
Name describing the location of the validation result.
Get a value characterizing the result.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationDetail.Message
member.summary: Get or set a message describing the validation failure.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationDetail.Key
member.summary: Get or set a name describing the location of the validation result.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationDetail.Tag
member.summary: Get or set a value characterizing the fault.
member.remarks: The meaning for a tag is determined by the client code consuming the .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationElement
member.summary: Represents a configuration element that specifies validation features for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationElement.CreateBehavior
member.summary: Creates a behavior extension based on the current configuration settings.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationElement.BehaviorType
member.summary: Gets the type of behavior.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.WCF.ValidationFault
member.summary: This class is used to return information to a WCF client when validation fails on a service parameter.
